DOC.brief_title: High-Intensity Interval Training Women Heightened Risk Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Study Groups : If agree take part research study , randomly assign ( roll dice ) 1 3 study group . This do one know one study group well , , bad group . You equal chance assign group : - If Group 1 , take part high-intensity interval ( HIIT ) exercise . - If Group 2 , take part moderate-intensity exercise . - If Group 3 , take part assign exercise , receive write material counsel exercise physiologist . If Group 1 Group 2 , also receive write material instruction perform exercise . Physical Activity : If Group 1 2 , come Energy Balance Center exercise 3 time week 12 week . If Group 1 , walk uphill treadmill total 33 minute . There 5-minute warm , follow four 4-minute interval . Between interval , walk 3 minute . There 3 minute cool . If Group 2 , exercise Energy Balance Center 3 time week . You walk uphill treadmill use stationary bicycle continuously 41 minute . If Group 3 , 1 time month study , call member study staff ask exercise do weight loss goal . Each phone call take 15 minute . The exercise training intensity may reduce stop temporarily experience side effect . Length Study : No matter group , participation study 12 week . You take study intolerable side effect . Study Visits : All participant visit MD Anderson Behavioral Research Treatment Center study visit . At baseline : - You cardiopulmonary exercise test ( CPET ) check lung function . The CPET check well lung work measure much oxygen carbon dioxide lung take release breathe . To perform test , ask walk treadmill reach point long exercise . You breathe machine walk . This test take 30 minute complete . The study doctor present CPET available respond complication . - You EKG check heart function . The study doctor present EKG . - Blood ( 1½ tablespoon ) draw biomarker testing . You ask fast ( eat nothing drink water ) least 12 hour blood draw part study . - You dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) scan measure body mass . - You complete questionnaire ask demographic ( age , race , ) , past medical history , lifestyle habit . This questionnaire take 5 minute complete . - You complete 5 questionnaire quality life , exercise experience , level fatigue . These take total 15 minute complete . At 6 week : - You CPET . - You EKG . At 12 week : - You CPET . - Blood ( 1½ tablespoon ) draw biomarker testing . - You EKG . - You DEXA scan . - You complete questionnaire complete baseline . - If Group 1 2 , interview member study staff . You ask 5 question experience assign exercise program . It take 5 minute complete . One ( 1 ) time month , attend motivational session . During session , discus strategy overcome barrier may keep attend completing exercise . You also talk continue physical activity complete program . This session last 15-30 minute . This investigational study . Up 36 participant enrol study . All take part MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Postmenopausal woman [ define per provider discretion notate medical record ] 2 . At high risk develop breast cancer ( history Ductal Carcinoma In Situ ( DCIS ) , Lobular Carcinoma In Situ ( LCIS ) , Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia ( ADH ) , Gail 5 year risk > 1.66 % lifetime risk > 20 % ) 3 . Enrolled Longitudinal High Risk Cohort study 4 . Oriented person , place , time 5 . BMI > equal 25 kg/m2 6 . Speaks read English 1 . Underlying medical problem contraindicate unsupervised exercise . 2 . Women prior history cardiovascular disease , define 1 positive response Heart Questionnaire ( Appendix D ) . 3 . Uses walker wheelchair/scooter 4 . Is treat diagnosed diabetes autoimmune disease 5 . Lives outside great Houston area ( Harris contiguous county ) 6 . Is pregnant ( selfreported ) 7 . Is take risk reduction therapy tamoxifen
